H0.text: Considered the largest food company globally (at 2011), Nestlé was founded and is headquartered in what country. France

H1.text: Considered the largest food company globally (at 2011), Nestlé was founded and is headquartered in what country. United States

H2.text: Considered the largest food company globally (at 2011), Nestlé was founded and is headquartered in what country. Germany

H3.text: Considered the largest food company globally (at 2011), Nestlé was founded and is headquartered in what country. Suiza

A4.text: Nestlé is headquartered in Vevey, Switzerland.

A5.text: Nestlé was formed in 1905 by the merger of Anglo-Swiss Condensed Milk Company and Farine Lactée Henri Nestlé, both established in Switzerland.
